text: illeogalodoe naui junimkkeseoneun geubun-i wonhaneun geubun-ui jong-ege il yonghal yangsig-eul pungseongke hayeo jusigo tto jehando hasinani neohuiga junim eul wihae sayonghaneun eotteon geosdo geubunkkeseoneun bosang-eul hasigeoneul geubun-eun il-yonghal yangsig-eul jusineun gajang hullyung han bun-isila
